argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | grpsubid.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | grpsubid.o | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | grpsubid.m | |- .- = ( -g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` G ) = ( +g ` G ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invg ` G ) = ( invg ` G ) |
| 6 | 1, 4, 5, 3 | #P_grpsubval | |- ( ( X e. B /\ X e. B ) -> ( X .- X ) = ( X ( +g ` G ) ( ( invg ` G ) ` X ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_anidms | |- ( X e. B -> ( X .- X ) = ( X ( +g ` G ) ( ( invg ` G ) ` X ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. B ) -> ( X .- X ) = ( X ( +g ` G ) ( ( invg ` G ) ` X ) ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 4, 2, 5 | #P_grprinv | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. B ) -> ( X ( +g ` G ) ( ( invg ` G ) ` X ) ) = .0. ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. B ) -> ( X .- X ) = .0. ) |
